item.title: Lecture at the ICSC Course: Introductory course to HLS FPGA programming
item.description: Lecture at the ICSC Course: Introductory course to HLS FPGA programming, a course thought for the new personnel hired by means of the ICSC project to work on projects and research activities in the framework of Spoke 2 (“Fundamental Research And Space Economy”). It has been an occasion to build new documentation and hands-on material for the BondMachine project now available in the BM repository. Slides on the docs section of the site.

item.title: Talk at Workshop of the CCR of INFN
item.description:
Talk about our latest work on creating computing accelerators at Workshop of the CCR of INFN.
Slides on the docs section of the site.

item.title: BondMachine Project Thrives with Four Talks in Late 2022
item.description:
The year 2022 drew to a close with an exhilarating period for the BondMachine project, as it witnessed the presentation of four captivating talks across various locations. These engaging sessions showcased the progress made by the project. Let’s delve into the highlights of these talks that marked the end of 2022 as a truly exceptional period for BondMachine.

  1. “Machine Learning inference with the BondMachine project” - Machine Learning Techniques with FPGA Devices for Particle Physics Experiments
  2. “The BondMachine project” - Joint ICTP-IAEA School on FPGA-based SoC and its Applications to Nuclear and Scientific Instrumentation
  3. “Machine Learning on FPGA” - Third edition of the Machine Learning at INFN advanced level hackathon
  4. “Machine Learning on FPGA: The BondMachine Project” - SOSC 2022 Fourth International School on Open Science Cloud

Slides on the docs section of the site.

item.title: BondMachine article published on Parallel Computing
item.description:
Our article on the BondMachine has been published on Parallel Computing (Elsevier) a peer-reviewed journal.

Check it out

item.title: VGA and Keyboard firmwares
item.description: The BondMachine has now interfaces for keyboard and VGA monitors.

item.title: Talk at ParCo2019
item.description: Talk at The International Conference on Parallel Computing ParCo2019. Slides on the docs section of the site.

item.title: Lecture at 2019 NiPS Summer school
item.description: 2 hours lecture “Enabling Machine Learning on FPGA” in the program of the NiPS Summer School 2019 – Architectures and Algorithms for Energy-Efficient IoT and HPC Applications. The lecture was about the use a system like the BondMachine to run ML payloads on FPGA. Slides on the docs section of the site.

item.title: Lecture at ICTP
item.description: Lecture “The BondMachine: a moldable computer architecture” in the program of the Advanced Workshop on Modern FPGA Based Technology for Scientific Computing. The lecture was about the BondMachine project and contains a full hands-on session made on Zedboards. Slides on the docs section of the site.

item.title: Video of the InnovateFPGA 2018 Global
item.description: Terasic and Intel published on youtube the video recap of the last year grand final. We where there with the BondMachine, check it on the media section of the site.

item.title: Talk at ISGC2019
item.description:
Talk at The International Symposium on Grids and Clouds (ISGC) 2019. The talk was fucused on the BondMachine project and its possible machine learning applications.

Slides on the docs section of the site.

item.title: Interview at TEF
item.description: Same day ago we where guests on an episode of “Speciale Università” a talk show of TEF a local TV (in italian). Unfortunately the episode is not available online anymore.

item.title: InnovateFPGA 2018 Grand Final Iron Award
item.description: The project won the Iron Award at the InnovateFPGA 2018 grand final at Intel Campus in San Jose (CA) USA on 15th of August 2018. It has been a pleasure and an honor to be there. I collected some photos of our adventure in San Francisco.

item.title: NiPS Summer School 2018
item.description: Poster of the BondMachine project presented at the NiPS Summer School 2018.

item.title: InnovateFPGA Grand final
item.description: The project reached the InnovateFPGA Grand final by winning the silver award in the EMEA final. We will present the project in San Jose in August.

item.title: InnovateFPGA Regional final
item.description: The project reached the InnovateFPGA EMEA Regional final, we are very happy for this achivement.

item.title: The BondMachine partecipation @ InnovateFPGA 2018
item.description: The BondMachine project will participate in the InnovateFPGA 2018 contest, wish us good luck.

item.title: The BondMachine @ Umbria Business Matching 2017
item.description: For the second time we presented the BondMachine prototype “James” at the Umbria Business Matching event in Bastia Umbra, Italy.

item.title: The BondMachine @ Umbria Business Matching 2016

item.title: The BondMachine @ Maker Faire 2016 Rome
item.description: We presented our prototype at Maker Faire 2016 in Rome. It has been an exciting adventure and we would like to thank everyone that stopped to our stand and give us feedback about our project and ideas.
